name: actions_delete-workflow-run
description:
Delete a specific workflow run. Anyone with write access to the repository can use this endpoint. If the repository is
private you must use an access token with the `repo` scope. GitHub Apps must have the `actions:write` permission to use
this endpoint.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.
